architectural_elements.name: Floor-to-Ceiling Bookshelves
architectural_elements.description: Tall, wooden bookshelves filled with ancient, leather-bound books. Some shelves are empty or have books askew.

architectural_elements.name: Ladder on Rails
architectural_elements.description: A rolling ladder attached to the bookshelves, slightly creaky and unstable.

architectural_elements.name: High Ceiling with Wooden Beams
architectural_elements.description: Dark wooden beams with cobwebs, cracks, and peeling paint.

architectural_elements.name: Large Windows
architectural_elements.description: Stained-glass or arched windows with heavy curtains, allowing dim light to filter in.

architectural_elements.name: Fireplace
architectural_elements.description: A grand, unused fireplace with soot stains, cracked mantel, and possibly a ghostly fire effect.

furniture_and_decor.name: Reading Desk
furniture_and_decor.description: A large, ornate desk with ink stains, quills, and half-burned candles.

furniture_and_decor.name: Leather Armchairs
furniture_and_decor.description: Worn-out armchairs with cracks and dust, positioned near the fireplace.

furniture_and_decor.name: Globes
furniture_and_decor.description: Antique globes, some cracked or showing supernatural markings.

furniture_and_decor.name: Standing Lamps
furniture_and_decor.description: Brass or iron lamps with flickering bulbs or candles, casting eerie shadows.

furniture_and_decor.name: Rugs
furniture_and_decor.description: Threadbare Persian rugs with moth-eaten patterns or mysterious stains.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick cobwebs draped across bookshelves, furniture, and corners.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust Particles
atmospheric_details.description: Floating in the air, visible in shafts of light or near the windows.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: Lamps or candles that flicker unpredictably, creating an unsettling atmosphere.

atmospheric_details.name: Ghostly Whispers
atmospheric_details.description: Faint whispers or the sound of pages turning on their own.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Spots
atmospheric_details.description: Areas in the room that feel unnaturally cold, possibly with visible breath.

interactive_objects.name: Ancient Books
interactive_objects.description: Books with cryptic symbols, hidden compartments, or pages that reveal clues when opened.

interactive_objects.name: Locked Drawers
interactive_objects.description: Drawers in the desk or bookshelves that require a key or puzzle to open.

interactive_objects.name: Quill and Inkwell
interactive_objects.description: A quill that can be used to write or reveal hidden messages when dipped in ink.

interactive_objects.name: Pocket Watch
interactive_objects.description: A broken pocket watch hidden in a drawer or book, tied to a time-based puzzle.

interactive_objects.name: Portrait
interactive_objects.description: A painting of a past librarian or mansion owner, with eyes that follow the player.

environmental_effects.name: Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Pages of books fluttering or curtains moving as if pushed by an unseen force.

environmental_effects.name: Fog
environmental_effects.description: A thin layer of mist near the floor, adding to the eerie atmosphere.

environmental_effects.name: Bloodstains or Ink Blots
environmental_effects.description: Mysterious stains on books, the desk, or floor, hinting at past events.

environmental_effects.name: Falling Leaves
environmental_effects.description: Dried leaves or book pages drifting down from the shelves.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Streaming through the windows, casting long shadows across the bookshelves.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Flickering candles on the desk or sconces, creating a ghostly ambiance.

lighting.name: Fireplace Glow
lighting.description: A faint, ghostly glow from the fireplace, even if it's not lit.
